title: Herby prawn pasta salad
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '110g uncooked macaroni pasta', '150g small cooked prawns, chopped', '3 sticks celery, finely chopped', '2 spring onions, finely sliced', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon coarsely chopped fresh parsley', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '250ml mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 sprig fresh dill for garnish or as needed', '1 sprig fresh parsley for garnish or as needed']
